name: Family Support Services
description: Homeless Prenatal Program (HPP) offers a comprehensive approach to family stability through trauma-informed case management services that help families reach goals with one-on-one counseling. Services include: - New Beginnings program: Individuals experiencing high-risk pregnancies receive intensive case management to support positive birth outcomes. Challenging factors to these pregnancies include recent substance use, homelessness, incarceration, mental health issues and other concerns. - Keep

howToGetIt: Though they strive to reach everyone in a timely manner, please note that they are experiencing a very high volume of requests for services. Please fill out the remote services interest form above and a staff member will reach out to you as soon as possible. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc4j4vw8ayPI2qXBqxAb36z0UE1satQjy8QnX73xYrIEAjdbA/viewform
